short_commentary: Borg survives McEnroe in a 5-set epic, including the legendary 18-16 tiebreak.
career_impact: Borg's fifth straight Wimbledon; McEnroe's arrival as a superstar.
cultural_resonance: Defined the Borg McEnroe rivalry; the tiebreak became tennis folklore.

short_commentary: Cash wins his only Slam, climbing into the stands to celebrate with family.
career_impact: Cash's crowning moment; Lendl's grass-court frustration.
cultural_resonance: First player to climb into the box; started a Wimbledon tradition.

short_commentary: Wilander wins his third Slam of 1988, outlasting Lendl in a 4h54m battle.
career_impact: Wilander becomes world No. 1; peak of his career.
cultural_resonance: First man since Connors to win three Slams in a year; marked the end of Lendl's US Open reign.

historical_significance: The Underhand Serve and the Miracle Run
short_commentary: 17-year-old Chang stuns Lendl with gutsy tactics and the famous underhand serve.
career_impact: Chang becomes youngest male Slam winner; Lendl's clay dominance shaken.
cultural_resonance: Chang's faith and fight inspired millions; the underhand serve became legend.

short_commentary: Edberg wins after back-to-back 5-setters; classic serve-and-volley display.
career_impact: Edberg's last Slam; cemented his legacy as a US Open great.
cultural_resonance: End of an era for classic net play; Edberg's sportsmanship celebrated.

short_commentary: Sampras, emotionally spent after coach's illness, rallies from two sets down.
career_impact: Sampras's mental strength mythologized; inspired a generation.
cultural_resonance: Sampras's tears on court became an iconic image of vulnerability in sport.

short_commentary: Sampras and Agassi, both at their best, deliver a classic under the lights.
career_impact: Sampras's US Open dominance; Agassi's resurgence.
cultural_resonance: Prime-time tennis; the match that defined a generation.

short_commentary: Agassi comes back from two sets down to win his only French Open.
career_impact: Agassi becomes the fifth man to complete the Career Grand Slam.
cultural_resonance: Agassi's redemption story; inspired late-career comebacks.

short_commentary: Wildcard Ivanisevic wins emotional Wimbledon after 3 final losses.
career_impact: Ivanisevic's only Slam; cemented his entertainer legacy.
cultural_resonance: 'People's Champion' moment; inspired wildcard rule debates.

short_commentary: Nadal dethrones Federer in epic Wimbledon final; widely considered the best.
career_impact: Nadal proved he was more than just a clay-court specialist; Federer's aura shattered.
cultural_resonance: Made tennis mainstream; a cultural moment beyond sport.

short_commentary: Nadal outlasts Verdasco in 5h14m; one of the greatest matches ever.
career_impact: Nadal's confidence for final; Verdasco's career highlight.
cultural_resonance: Set new standards for physical and mental endurance.

short_commentary: Nadal wins first hard-court Slam; Federer's emotional breakdown.
career_impact: Launched Nadal's hard-court dominance; Federer's pursuit of Sampras delayed.
cultural_resonance: Federer's tears humanized him; Nadal's sportsmanship was legendary.

short_commentary: Del Potro stuns Federer; only Slam title for the Argentine.
career_impact: Del Potro's peak before injuries; Federer's US Open reign ended.
cultural_resonance: Argentina's tennis renaissance; a 'what-if' story due to injuries.

short_commentary: Djokovic saves match points with iconic return vs Federer.
career_impact: Djokovic's psychological breakthrough; Federer's US Open confidence shaken.
cultural_resonance: The shot heard 'round the tennis world; defined clutch tennis.

short_commentary: Longest Slam final; Djokovic outlasts Nadal in 5 hours, 53 minutes.
career_impact: Djokovic's hard-court dominance established; Nadal's confidence shaken.
cultural_resonance: Redefined tennis endurance; iconic trophy ceremony with chairs.

short_commentary: Murray ends Britain's 76-year Slam drought.
career_impact: Murray's breakthrough; validated his place in Big 4.
cultural_resonance: National celebration; Murray became a British icon.

short_commentary: Djokovic edges Wawrinka 12-10 in the fifth; rivalry ignited.
career_impact: Launched Wawrinka's belief; Djokovic's resilience reaffirmed.
cultural_resonance: Set the stage for future Slam classics between the two.

short_commentary: Wawrinka wins first Slam; defeats injured Nadal.
career_impact: Launched Wawrinka's late-career surge.
cultural_resonance: Journeyman's dream; Wawrinka's tattoo became iconic.

short_commentary: Wawrinka denies Djokovic Career Grand Slam.
career_impact: Delayed Djokovic's Career Grand Slam; Wawrinka proved his first Slam wasn't a fluke.
cultural_resonance: David vs. Goliath; Wawrinka's backhand was poetry.

short_commentary: Federer returns from injury, beats Nadal in 5; 18th Slam.
career_impact: Launched Federer's Indian Summer; proved age was just a number.
cultural_resonance: Feel-good story; inspired aging athletes.

short_commentary: Djokovic saves match points; longest Wimbledon final; new tiebreak rule.
career_impact: Federer's last realistic Slam chance; Djokovic's mental fortitude.
cultural_resonance: Heartbreak for Federer fans; defined clutch tennis.

short_commentary: Nadal's comeback from 2 sets down; breaks Big 3's Slam tie.
career_impact: Nadal ahead in GOAT race; Medvedev's final loss; Nadal's resilience.
cultural_resonance: Defied age and logic; reignited GOAT debates.

short_commentary: Alcaraz ends Djokovic's Wimbledon reign; new era begins.
career_impact: Alcaraz established as Djokovic's rival; new superstar.
cultural_resonance: Torch-passing moment; Alcaraz's maturity impressed.
